name: Ditch or Hitch
description:
Ditch or Hitch, a transformation text game.

You are driving home and you encounter a hitchhiker! Will you take the hitchhiker on your journey or will you leave the hitchhiker behind?

This game contains adult M/M, F/F, and M/F sexual content. This game contains Male to Female and Female to Male transformation content. The possible hitchhikers you encounter are randomized. Male hitchhikers can transform into: anthropomorphic Bee;  anthropomorphic Gorilla; Kobold; Naga; Werewolf. Female hitchhikers can transform into:  anthropomorphic Binturong;  anthropomorphic Crow;  anthropomorphic Horse;  anthropomorphic Kangaroo;  anthropomorphic Squirrel.

This is Version 1.00 of Ditch or Hitch. You can find more games on my Patreon, discord, and FurAffinity accounts with the specific links listed on the first page of the actual game. If you would like to support me, then become a patron at https://www.patreon.com/desirelines and you will receive access to early content and strategy guides for my games.
